title: My Picture - "I know thee right" is paraphrased as

content.question: In line 21, "I know thee right" is best paraphrased as

choices.label: you are as loyal as you should be
my understanding of your feelings is correct
your sense of propriety is the same as mine
I tell you honestly of my love

content.answer: my understanding of your feelings is correct

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
